import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {clearItemFromCart} from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import './checkout-item.styles.scss' const CheckoutItem = ({ cartItem: { name, imageUrl, price, quantity}, clearItem }) => (
{name} {quantity} ${price}
clear}> ✕
) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ clearItem: clearItemFromCart(dispatch) }) export default connect(null, mapDispatchToProps)(CheckoutItem)
